messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Good Morning, Crew. This is your official Wake Up Call. The shift has begun and hopefuly you all have woken up from cryo. The prep crew set up everything but we still need to set up power. Have a Safe and Productive Shift!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: We bluespaced in the station a new cyborg to deal with the lack of personnel.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Primary Tool Storage.
